Automotive Inc. is looking for long-term, strategic partners who are capable of delivering successful supplier, technology & organizational transformation:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SMOOTH SUPPLIER/PROJECT TRANSITION - Best in class services transition expertise and experience underpinned by proven methodologies, blueprints and accelerators.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PRODUCT LINE INNOVATION - Innovative mindset to continuously improve, transform and mature delivered services. Possessing vision and investment in new technologies to enable innovation and year-over-year efficiency gains\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT EFFICIENCY AND EFFICACY - Improve time to value and be flexible to the ever-changing needs of the business.  Skill, knowledge, domain expertise are key to deliver service excellence\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ON DEMAND SOFTWARE ENGINEERING SCALABILITY - On demand engineering scalability supported by a proven operating model, strong management and ownership, as well as the requisite supplier domain expertise, skills and delivery locations\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ENGAGEMENT ACCELERATION - Proven operating model and delivery methodologies to accelerate project initiation, delivery outcomes and time to value\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ENGINEERING LEADERSHIP - A culture of strong technical delivery, engineering excellence and strategic vision, driven by accountability for outcomes, performance management and improved customer experiences. A trusted advisor, providing thought leadership, guidance and options \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":14299,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/acb1c43d-1ba5-49ed-834e-5893cc5bcd30/2.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/acb1c43d-1ba5-49ed-834e-5893cc5bcd30/2.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"2.JPG\",\"name\":\"2.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"acb1c43d-1ba5-49ed-834e-5893cc5bcd30\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":638,\"height\":70},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Internally CoX Automotive structure their development teams of the Data Services (service lines)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Information Technology (service lines)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":13256,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9109920c-a322-4cd1-93aa-1c3d57a5fcac/3.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9109920c-a322-4cd1-93aa-1c3d57a5fcac/3.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"3.JPG\",\"name\":\"3.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9109920c-a322-4cd1-93aa-1c3d57a5fcac\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":640,\"height\":66},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CAPG (Cox Automotive Product Group) uses a tailored product delivery framework based on the Scaled Agile Framework called\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CAFé (Cox Automotive Framework for the Enterprise)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". CAFé helps CAPG better plan and prioritize work by increasing alignment, transparency, and consistency across the organization. It operates on four levels: Portfolio Investments, Delivery Streams, Release Trains, and Scrum Teams.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Teams at all levels align work and priorities to deliver on portfolio investments that ultimately deliver enterprise business initiatives. Work at the portfolio level is broken down into investments which are broken down at the delivery stream level into epics which are broken down at the release train level into features which are broken down at the scrum team level into stories. The resulting work is delivered to the teams responsible for execution and measurement.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":295064,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/56900be4-722f-449c-bb58-9ad2d2618484/image2020-3-22_16-42-55.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/56900be4-722f-449c-bb58-9ad2d2618484/image2020-3-22_16-42-55.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"image2020-3-22_16-42-55.png\",\"name\":\"image2020-3-22_16-42-55.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"56900be4-722f-449c-bb58-9ad2d2618484\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":837,\"height\":471},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The teams representing Portfolio Investments, Delivery Streams, and Release Trains are governance functions that currently reside in-house within the CAPG organization. The Scrum Teams are the function currently targeted for outsourcing and within the scope of this RFP.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each team participant’s primary role is to represent the requested outcomes of their organizations, to be delivered by the product delivery framework. These leaders will work as a team to develop, prioritize, and maintain backlogs of portfolio investments/epics that will help define those requested outcomes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":52812,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9b7cef66-26e1-417b-8bcb-a4dbbfee6061/Table.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9b7cef66-26e1-417b-8bcb-a4dbbfee6061/Table.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"Table.JPG\",\"name\":\"Table.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9b7cef66-26e1-417b-8bcb-a4dbbfee6061\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":835,\"height\":369},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CAPG produces software products on an extremely diverse technology stack based on the large number of businesses with different commercial needs that have been acquired over the years. The current state is a mix of on-prem and cloud (primarily AWS) environments in varying states of maturity, however, our strategic direction is to move toward AWS PaaS (not IaaS) but this will be an effort done with new development and migrations over time. It does mean that any new strategic partner will need to demonstrate strength in AWS.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":12150,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/10ddd392-7366-4a25-a59a-0036f2f2322e/4.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/10ddd392-7366-4a25-a59a-0036f2f2322e/4.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"4.JPG\",\"name\":\"4.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"10ddd392-7366-4a25-a59a-0036f2f2322e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":639,\"height\":63},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Approach of CAPG is to identify 2-3 Strategic Suppliers to partner with them on our journey toward a consolidated supplier base that will help them better scale resources to demand, improve efficiency, and help them continue to innovate our product lines.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"They are looking for Suppliers who provide superb software engineering services and delivery at competitive rates, can demonstrate best-in-class transition methodologies and experience to help guide them through our journey. They are also looking for suppliers who have the vision and investment in new technologies to help them innovate and achieve year-over-year efficiencies as they grow together with Suppliers. They expect these Suppliers to have robust On-shore, Near-Shore, and Off-shore delivery options and strong management of their resources. Last, they are looking for Suppliers who can provide guidance and options, not simply order takers.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
